#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {

	int t, M, N, i, j;

	cin>>t;

	while( t-- ) {

		cin>>M>>N;
		if( ( M == 0 ) && ( N == 0 ) )
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else {

			i = M / 2;
			j = N / 2;
			cout<< max( N - 1 - j, j ) + max( M - 1 - i, i ) + 1 <<endl;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
